subject: Order #SSN3790 - Missing Item
description_text:
Hi,

I have recently received my package for Order #SSN3790 however I seem to be missing the Plus X Pedal Control Box.
Please see photo attached of the package received.

Your help in resolving this matter quickly would be greatly appreciated.

Many thanks,
Sam Cooper.

conversations.body_text: Hi Sam Cooper,    We apologize for the delayed response! We have arranged for a replacement shipment. Please cancel your chargeback as soon as possible. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047184830356  We apologize for any inconvenience caused!
